name: One Shot (itch) (Taki Wacky)
description:
W and S keys to move up and down, shoot the blue rocks to not get hit by them. But, you only have one bullet. So if you miss it is game over. 

Made by Taki_Wacky

and nadalina_

https://scratch.mit.edu/users/nadalina_/

R to mute the music. There is also a volume slider.
